there go extending into the rural area
so it was very easy for them to get into

because it was army run oh yes it is an
army own an army operated school and
there's a very high likelihood that most
of the children in army public schools
all over the country are sons of our
children of serving a serving Army

swiftness with which the Taliban claimed

that this was in retaliation for the
army operation going on against the
Taliban in Pakistan tribal areas in
which hundreds of Taliban fighters have
been killed by the Pakistan Army over
the last few months so it was a very
clearly chosen target with an intent to
hurt not just Pakistan and the Pakistan
government but directly the Pakistan
Army now the reports I read earlier this
morning suggests that around 500
students and teachers are inside that
school so do you think the Pakistan Army
will now move to try to take the
building back we know that we heard from
an army spokesperson that military
commandos had gotten inside the school
by about that time most of the damage
had been done because it it was well
over an hour before they could get
inside the school they then told us that
a large number of students and teachers
had been evacuated safely but some of
the eyewitnesses eyewitness reports that
we heard from the local media talked
about lots and lots of bodies littered
all over the place
so the operation the rescue operation we
hear is still going on and and there are
some reports that the military
commanders inside the school
are looking still looking for the
attackers who may be hiding somewhere in
the building now bear in mind these are
large buildings lots of rooms there's
lots of corridors and if it's a hostage
situation if those attackers still have
hostages in them it will not be very
easy for the military commanders to wind
